relatedBlades.title: Unlocking cyber resilience
relatedBlades.copy: Building cyber resilience into company culture requires a shift in both mindset and behavior — here are 8 ways that leadership can reinforce cyber security as a culture.

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Security Innovation - Unlocking cyber resilience - Image

features.title: Regain control of IT with the connectivity cloud
features.description: Security has gone from being responsible for one technological domain — the on-prem environment — to many others, causing a loss in visibility and control

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Regain control of IT with the connectivity cloud - Image

features.title: Connecting cyber security to strategic business value
features.description: There is a growing need to shift security's role from risk management to strategic driver of business value. Achieving this requires alignment to outcomes rather than reacting to input

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Connecting cyber security to strategic business value - Image

features.title: Transform cyber security in the boardroom
features.description: 6 things the board of directors wants you to know: Changing the narrative of cyber security from a cost center to a strategic function that builds business resilience

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Transform cyber security in the boardroom - Image

features.title: Regain control of complex network environments
features.description: The disappearance of the network edge, the expanding attack surface, and the sophistication of threats mean enterprises must operate in domains they no longer exercise control over, and budget alone won't solve this loss in visibility and control
